org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.common.events

Class AbstractEventDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.common.events.AbstractEventDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IncomingFrames, EventDriver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractJsrEventDriver, JettyAnnotatedEventDriver, JettyListenerEventDriver

    public abstract class AbstractEventDriver
extends Object
implements IncomingFrames, EventDriver
    EventDriver is the main interface between the User's WebSocket POJO and the internal jetty implementation of WebSocket.

      • incomingFrame

        public void incomingFrame(Frame frame)
        Description copied from interface: IncomingFrames
        Process the incoming frame.

        Note: if you need to hang onto any information from the frame, be sure to copy it, as the information contained in the Frame will be released and/or reused by the implementation.

        Specified by:
        incomingFrame in interface IncomingFrames
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame to process
